title: 3 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords: Beginner's Guide + Planner + Low Competition High Demand #kdp

tactics.name: Niche Score Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate keyword profitability using niche scores from Titan Self-Publishing and Amazon Scout Pro extensions
steps: Check Titan Self-Publishing niche score (86 for 'pocket planner 2024-2025 for purse')
Verify Amazon Scout Pro keyword strength (score 8 for same keyword)
Compare total results (1,645) against average bestseller rank (under 300,000)
caveats: High total results may require sub-niching
source_quotes: pocket planner 2024-2025 has a keyword Nation score of 86 by self-publishing Titans

tactics.name: Sub-Niche Creation
tactics.description: Develop specialized versions of base keywords through design or audience targeting
steps: Create size-specific variations (8.5x8.5 inch pocket planners)
caveats: Requires creative assets and market validation
source_quotes: create a Botanical pocket planner 2024-2025 for a purse

tactics.name: sub_niche_series
tactics.description: Create a series of books (guidebook, activity book, coloring book) within a sub-niche to diversify sales and reduce competition
steps: Develop an activity book for application
Publish a coloring book as a third part
caveats: High total results require deeper sub-niching
source_quotes: you can have a series... coloring book as well

tactics.name: keyword_series_integration
tactics.description: Leverage keyword series by combining related niches (e.g., crystals + energy healing) across multiple book formats
source_quotes: you can include this keyword as part of the seven keyword slots

tactics.name: diverse_book_creation
tactics.description: Building a KDP portfolio with varied book types to gain niche expertise
source_quotes: you would always need to be able to create different types of books...

heuristics.name: Total Results Filter
heuristics.condition: If total results exceed 5,000, prioritize sub-niching
source_quotes: total results are six thousand fifty eight and yes I can hear you it is a little bit too high

heuristics.name: review_density_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If average reviews per result are high, prioritize niches with lower total results
source_quotes: average reviews are a massive four thousand and forty five

heuristics.name: review_based_boost
source_quotes: keyword news score of number six

claims.statement: The smallest KDP size is 8.5x8.5 inches for pocket planners
source_quotes: the smallest size that you can publish on Amazon's KDP is 8.5 times 8.5 inches

claims.statement: Amazon Pro categorizes 'beginner's guide to energy healing' as a niche with a keyword score of 6
source_quotes: keyword Niche score of number six by Amazon pro

claims.statement: The highest keyword score mentioned was 86 for 'pocket planner 2024-2025 for purse'

niche_patterns.description: Combine product type with audience-specific use cases
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets specific needs while maintaining broad appeal
source_quotes: perfect for a purse and perfect to take with you as a travel size

niche_patterns.example: crystals for children + beginner's guide + factual information
niche_patterns.description: Combine a specific identity (children), a problem (learning crystals), and a constraint (factual vs spiritual content) to create targeted niches
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances demand with low competition through educational focus
source_quotes: create a crystals for beginners book... provide factual information
